entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
